thread.title: Toni Kiwan and Laura Khalil to perform at Al Qasr restaurantTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Toni Kiwan and Laura Khalil to perform at Al Qasr restaurantTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Toni Kiwan and Laura Khalil to perform at Al Qasr restaurantTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Toni Kiwan and Laura Khalil to perform at Al Qasr restaurant Published on : Monday, September 21, 2015
The award-winning Al Qasr Lebanese restaurant based at Dubai Marine Beach Resort & Spa will be hosting a very special international musical event on 24th of September during Eid Al Adha, featuring acclaimed celebrity Lebanese singers Toni Kiwan and Laura Khalil, who will be performing their most popular songs on the night.
The newly renovated Al Qasr restaurant will be also welcoming the guests back with an additional attraction for this event, the oriental show by Marilia. The exciting entertainment program starts at 11pm on the 24th of September and will be covered by the major regional TV networks and local media.
